Title: Sonsabitches
Writer: Sam Catlin (developed by), Seth Rogen (developed by), Evan Goldberg (developed by), Garth Ennis (based on the graphic novels by), Steve Dillon (based on the graphic novels by), Sara Goodman
Actors: Dominic Cooper, Joseph Gilgun, Ruth Negga, Graham McTavish
Plot: Desperate to escape Angelville and his family, Jesse attempts to forge an unlikely alliance with a familiar adversary.
